original: Māratajjanīyasūtra
analyzed: māra tajjanīya sūtra

original: WalA.1 śramaṇa anenāvavādenāvavaditā maitrāsahagatena cittena pūrvavad yāvad vyāhārṣuḥ yatraiṣāṁ dūṣī māraḥ avatāraprekṣī avatāragaveṣī na labhate  #
analyzed: śramaṇa anena avavādena avavaditā maitrā sahagatena cittena pūrvavat yāvat vyāhārṣuḥ yatra eṣām dūṣī māraḥ avatāra prekṣī avatāra gaveṣī na labhate  /

original: avatāraṁ na labhate ālambanam /
analyzed: avatāram na labhate ālambanam

original: WalA.2 tena khalu samayena yaḥ kaścic chrāddho brāhamaṇagṛhapatiḥ kālaṁ karoti sa yadbhūyasā kāyasya bhedāt paraṁ maraṇād apāyadurgativivnipātaṁ  #
analyzed: tena khalu samayena yaḥ kaścid śrāddhaḥ brāhamaṇa gṛhapatiḥ kālam karoti sa yat bhūyasā kāyasya bhedāt param maraṇāt apāya durgati vivnipātam

original: narakeṣūpapadyate /
analyzed: narakeṣu upapadyate

original: WalA.3 atha dūṣino mārasyāvatāraprekṣino ’vatāragaveṣina etad abhavat / tathāhaṁ na labhe
analyzed: atha dūṣinaḥ mārasya avatāra prekṣinaḥ vatāra gaveṣinaḥ etat abhavat tathā aham na labhe

original: muṇḍakānāṁ śramaṇānāṁ avatāraṁ na labhe ālambanaṁ yannv ahaṁ śrāddhāṁ brāhmaṇagṛhapatīms
analyzed: muṇḍakānām śramaṇānām avatāram na labhe ālambanam yat nu aham śrāddhām brāhmaṇa gṛhapatīm

original: tathā tathā anvāviśaṁ ye yathā śramaṇāṁ śīlavato guṇavato dṛṣṭvā satkurvaṁti gurukurvaṁti
analyzed: tathā tathā anvāviśam ye yathā śramaṇām śīlavataḥ guṇavataḥ dṛṣṭvā satkurvati gurukurvati

original: mānayaṁti pūjayaṁti / atra śramaṇānāṁ satkriyatām gurukriyatām pūjyatāṁ syāc cetasa
analyzed: mānayati pūjayati atra śramaṇānām satkriyatām gurukriyatām pūjyatām syāt

original: anyathātvaṁ yathāhaṁ avatāraprekṣī avatāraragaveṣī labhe avatāraṁ labhe ālambanam /
analyzed: anyathātvam yathā aham avatāra prekṣī avatāra raga veṣī labhe avatāram labhe ālambanam

original: WalA.4 tena khalu samayena śraddhā brāhaṇagṛhapatayaḥ tathā tathā anvāviṣṭā yathā śramaṇāṁ śīlavato guṇavato dṛṣṭvā satkurvaṁti gurukurvaṁti  #
analyzed: tena khalu samayena śraddhā brāhaṇa gṛhapatayaḥ tathā tathā anvāviṣṭā yathā śramaṇām śīlavataḥ guṇavataḥ dṛṣṭvā satkurvati gurukurvati  /

original: mānayaṁti pūjayaṁti /
analyzed: mānayati pūjayati

original: WalA.5 apīdānīṁ śikṣodditā piṇḍapātā brāhmaṇagṛhapatibhiḥ prajñaptāḥ / evaṁ cāhuḥ / pratigṛhṇantv
analyzed: api idānīm śikṣā udditā piṇḍapātāḥ brāhmaṇa gṛhapatibhiḥ prajñaptāḥ evam ca āhuḥ pratigṛhṇantu

original: asmākaṁ śramaṇāḥ śīlavaṁto guṇavaṁtaḥ śikṣodditāṁ piṇḍapātāṁs tad asmākam bhaviṣyati
analyzed: asmākam śramaṇāḥ śīlavataḥ guṇavataḥ piṇḍapātāḥ tat asmākam bhaviṣyati

original: dīrgharātram arthāya hitāya sukhāya /
analyzed: dīrgharātram arthāya hitāya sukhāya

original: WalA.6 apīdānīṁ śramaṇānām ahatāni vastrāṇi navāni dīrghadaśāni rathyāmukheṣu prajñapya
analyzed: api idānīm śramaṇānām ahatāni vastrāṇi navāni dīrgha daśāni rathyā mukheṣu prajñapya

original: evam āhuḥ / ākramantv asmākaṁ śramaṇāḥ śīlavaṁto guṇavaṁtaḥ ahatāni vastrāṇi navāni
analyzed: evam āhuḥ ākramantu asmākam śramaṇāḥ śīlavataḥ guṇavataḥ ahatāni vastrāṇi navāni

original: dīrghadaśāni pādbhyāṁ tad asmākaṁ bhaviṣyati dīrgharātram arthāya hitāya sukhāya /
analyzed: dīrgha daśāni pādbhyām tat asmākam bhaviṣyati dīrgharātram arthāya hitāya sukhāya

original: WalA.7 apīdānīṁ śramaṇānām uttamāṅgaruhāṁ keśāṁ rathyāmukheṣu prajñapyaivam āhuḥ / ākramaṁtu
analyzed: api idānīm śramaṇānām uttama aṅga ruhām keśām rathyā mukheṣu prajñapya evam āhuḥ ākramatu

original: guṇavaṁtaḥ uttamāṅgaruhān keśāṁ pādbhyāṁ tad asmākaṁ bhaviṣyati dīrgharātram arthāya hitāya sukhāya /
analyzed: guṇavataḥ uttamāṅgaruhān keśām pādbhyām tat asmākam bhaviṣyati dīrgharātram arthāya hitāya sukhāya

original: WalA.8 apīdānīṁ śramaṇāṁ śīlavato gunavato dṛṣṭvā sarvāṅgair anupariṣvajya antargṛhe praviśya
analyzed: api idānīm śramaṇām śīlavataḥ gunavataḥ dṛṣṭvā sarva aṅgaiḥ anupariṣvajya antargṛhe praviśya

original: prajñapta evāsane niṣādayaṁti / evam cāhuḥ / nisīdantv asmākaṁ śramaṇāḥ śīlavaṁto
analyzed: prajñapte eva āsane niṣādayati evam ca āhuḥ nisīdantu asmākam śramaṇāḥ

original: guṇavaṁtaḥ prajñapta evāsane tad asmākaṁ bhaviṣyati dīrgharātram arthāya hitāya sukhāya /
analyzed: guṇavataḥ prajñapte eva āsane tat asmākam bhaviṣyati dīrgharātram arthāya hitāya sukhāya

original: WalA.9 atha krakasundasya samyaksaṁbuddhasya śrāvakāḥ satkṛtā gurukṛtā mānitā pūjitā yena krakasundaḥ samyaksaṁbuddhas tenopajagmuḥ /
analyzed: atha krakasundasya samyaksabuddhasya śrāvakāḥ satkṛtāḥ gurukṛtāḥ mānitā pūjitāḥ yena krakasundaḥ samyaksabuddhaḥ tena upajagmuḥ

original: WalB.1 śramaṇa krakasundena samyaksaṁbuddhena anenāvavādenāvavaditāḥ saṁskāreṣv anityānudarśino
analyzed: śramaṇa krakasundena samyaksabuddhena anena avavādena avavaditāḥ saskāreṣu anitya anudarśinaḥ

original: viharaṁti pūrvavad yāvat pratiniḥsargānudarśinaḥ / yatraiṣāṁ dūṣī māraḥ avatāraprekṣī
analyzed: viharati pūrvavat yāvat pratiniḥsarga anudarśinaḥ yatra eṣām dūṣī māraḥ avatāra prekṣī

original: avatāragaveṣī na labhate avatāraṁ na labhate ālambhanam /
analyzed: avatāra gaveṣī na labhate avatāram na labhate ālambhanam

original: WalB.2 tena khalu samayena yaḥ kaścic chrāddho brāhamaṇagṛhapatiḥ kālaṁ karoti sa yadbhūyasā kāyasya bhedāt paraṁ maraṇāt sugatau svargaloke  #
analyzed: tena khalu samayena yaḥ kaścid śrāddhaḥ brāhamaṇa gṛhapatiḥ kālam karoti sa yat bhūyasā kāyasya bhedāt param maraṇāt sugatau svarga loke  /

original: deveṣūpadyate /
analyzed: deveṣu upadyate

original: WalB.3 atha dūṣino mārasyāvatāraprekṣina etad abhavat / tathāpy ahaṁ tr … na labhe muṇḍakānāṁ
analyzed: atha dūṣinaḥ mārasya avatāra prekṣinaḥ etat abhavat tathā api aham na labhe

original: śramaṇānāṁ evam anudarśinām avatāraṁ na labhe ālambanaṁ / yaṁnv ahaṁ kāyena āyuṣmantaṁ vidūram ākrameya /
analyzed: śramaṇānām evam anudarśinām avatāram na labhe ālambanam yanu aham kāyena āyuṣmantam vidūram ākrameya

original: WalB.4 eko ’yaṁ samayaḥ krakasundastathāgato ’rhan samyaksaṁbuddhaḥ sālāyāṁ viharati brāhmaṇagrāmake āyuṣmatā vidūreṇa paścācchramaṇena /
analyzed: ekaḥ yam samayaḥ krakasundaḥ tathāgataḥ rhan samyaksabuddhaḥ sālāyām viharati brāhmaṇa grāmake āyuṣmatā vidūreṇa paścācchramaṇena

original: WalB.5 atha krakasundaḥ saṁyaksaṁbuddhas tasyā eva rātryā atyayāt pūrvāhṇe nivasya pātracīvaram ādāya brāhmaṇagrāmakaṁ piṇḍāya prāviśad āyuṣmatā  #
analyzed: atha krakasundaḥ sayaksabuddhaḥ tasyāḥ eva rātryāḥ atyayāt pūrvāhṇe nivasya pātra cīvaram ādāya brāhmaṇagrāmakam piṇḍāya prāviśat āyuṣmatā

original: vidūreṇa paścācchramaṇena /
analyzed: vidūreṇa paścācchramaṇena

original: WalB.6 atha dūṣī māraḥ kumārarūpam anvāviśya śarkaram ādāya āyuṣmato vidūrasya śiro bhagnaṁ rudhiraṁ mukhe gālitam /
analyzed: atha dūṣī māraḥ kumāra rūpam anvāviśya śarkaram ādāya āyuṣmataḥ vidūrasya śiraḥ bhagnam rudhiram mukhe gālitam

original: WalB.7 tathāpy āyuṣmāṁ vidūraḥ śirasā bhagnena rudhireṇa mukhe galatā krakasundaṁ samyaksaṁbuddhaṁ pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhaḥ /
analyzed: tathā api āyuṣmān vidūraḥ śirasā bhagnena rudhireṇa mukhe galatā krakasundam samyaksabuddham pṛṣṭhatas pṛṣṭhatas samanubaddhaḥ

original: WalB.8 adrākṣīt pāpimaṁ krakasundaḥ samyaksaṁbuddho dakṣiṇena sarvakāyena nāgāvalokitena
analyzed: adrākṣīt pāpa imam krakasundaḥ samyaksabuddhaḥ dakṣiṇena sarva kāyena nāgāvalokitena

original: avalokayaṁn āyuṣmato vidūrasya śiro bhagnaṁ rudhiraṁ mukhe galat / dṛṣṭvā ca punar
analyzed: avalokayan āyuṣmataḥ vidūrasya śiraḥ bhagnam rudhiram mukhe galat dṛṣṭvā ca punar

original: huntiṁ kṛtvā vivācayati / ayaṁ dūṣī māra ṛddhimān / ayam eva dūṣī māro mātrāṁ nājñāsīt /
analyzed: huntim kṛtvā vivācayati ayam dūṣī māraḥ ṛddhimān  ayam eva dūṣī māraḥ mātrām na ajñāsīt

original: WalB.9 atra khalu pāpimaṁ yasya kasyacid ananvayāt tathāgatena hunti kṛtvā vivācitaṁ /
analyzed: atra khalu pāpimam yasya kasyacid an anvayāt tathāgatena kṛtvā vivācitam

original: WalB.10 atha sa dūṣī māras tasmāt sthānāt samantatareṇa avīcau mahānarake papitaḥ /
analyzed: atha sa dūṣī māraḥ tasmāt sthānāt samantatareṇa avīcau mahā narake papitaḥ

original: WalB.11 tena khalu samayenāvīcer mahānarakasya catasraḥ saṁjñā āsaṁ avīcir avirala iti śataśaṅkur ity api pratyātmavedanīya ity api ṣaṭsparśāyatanīya  #
analyzed: tena khalu samayena avīceḥ mahā narakasya catasraḥ sajñāḥ āsam avīciḥ aviralaḥ iti śataśaṅkuḥ iti api pratyātma vedanīyaḥ iti api ṣaṣ sparśa āyatanīya

original: ity api /
analyzed: iti api
